public ref class SemaphoreAcl abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供了一种特定于 Windows 的扩展方法，用于通过特定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 安全性来创建 对象。

span.span: Provides a Windows-specific extension method for creating objects with specific access control list (ACL) security.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Semaphore? Create (int initialCount, int maximumCount, string name, out bool createdNew, System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity);

span.span: The name, if the synchronization object is to be shared with other processes; otherwise, or an empty string.
The name is case-sensitive.

param.span: 如果 具有有效的非空值，则在创建系统信号量时，此参数设置为 ；如果找到具有该名称的现有系统信号量，则此参数设置为 。

span.span: If has a valid, non-empty value, this argument is set to when the system semaphore is created, or it is set to if an existing system semaphore is found with that name.

param.span: 要应用的可选信号量访问控制安全性。

span.span: The optional semaphore access control security to apply.

summary.span: 获取或创建 实例，允许在事件创建期间选择性地指定 实例来设置该实例。

span.span: Gets or creates an instance, allowing a instance to be optionally specified to set it during the event creation.

returns.span: 表示系统信号量（如果已命名）或本地信号量（如果未命名）的对象。

span.span: An object that represents a system semaphore, if named, or a local semaphore, if nameless.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`可以使用 `Global\` 或前缀 `Local\` 来指定命名空间。The `name` may be prefixed with `Global\` or `Local\` to specify a namespace. 如果 `Global` 指定了命名空间，则同步对象可能与系统上的任何进程共享。When the `Global` namespace is specified, the synchronization object may be shared with any processes on the system. `Local`指定命名空间后，如果未指定命名空间，这也是默认命名空间，则同步对象可能与同一会话中的进程共享。When the `Local` namespace is specified, which is also the default when no namespace is specified, the synchronization object may be shared with processes in the same session. 在 Windows 上，会话是一个登录会话，服务通常在不同的非交互式会话中运行。On Windows, a session is a login session, and services typically run in a different non-interactive session. 在类似 Unix 的操作系统上，每个 shell 都有自己的会话。On Unix-like operating systems, each shell has its own session. 会话本地同步对象可能适用于具有父/子关系的进程之间的同步，它们全都在同一会话中运行。Session-local synchronization objects may be appropriate for synchronizing between processes with a parent/child relationship where they all run in the same session. 有关 Windows 上的 synchornization 对象名称的详细信息，请参阅 [对象名称](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/sync/object-names)。For more information about synchornization object names on Windows, see [Object Names](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/sync/object-names). 如果提供了， `name` 并且命名空间中已存在请求类型的同步对象，则会打开现有的同步对象。If a `name` is provided and a synchronization object of the requested type already exists in the namespace, the existing synchronization object is opened. 如果命名空间中已存在另一个类型的同步对象， `WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException` 则会引发。If a synchronization object of a different type already exists in the namespace, a `WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException` is thrown. 否则，将创建一个新的同步对象。Otherwise, a new synchronization object is created.
